ctx: assert (Hnr := period_lub m z Hinv Hexd).
exceptions.exn: The reference iter_upb was not found in the current environment.

original: intros m z Hinv Hexd. assert (Hnr := period_lub m z Hinv Hexd). unfold iter_upb in Hnr. destruct Hnr as [Hnr0 [Hnreq Hnrforall]]. assert (Hdeg := degree_pos m z Hexd). exists (degree m z). repeat split. - apply Hdeg. - apply Hnreq. - intros i Hi. apply (degree_diff m z Hinv Hexd i Hi).
